review.title: “K-Line”
review.pros: Pros – Great Vacation/Holiday BenefitsConsistent Work environmentTreatment of employees even across the companyRegular reviews with consistent feedback for staff
review.cons: Cons – Open regardless of weather/safety of employees of less concernMicromanaged to deathInexperienced managers right out of collegeEver changing staff

review.title: “Okay if you have realistic expectations”
review.pros: Pros – Good benefits.Good amount of vacation/personal days.Employees are generally treated respectfully.Coworkers are friendly.
review.cons: Cons – Compensation is below market levels for equivalent positions in the area.Very limited opportunity for professional growth.The industry as a whole is going through tough times financially.Expected to come in during winter weather with dangerous road conditions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – If you want to retain high quality, talented employees, they must be paid competitive salaries and have opportunities to be promoted and obtain training. Right now this is a good place to start a career but there is no incentive to stay.

review.title: “Assistant Manager”
review.pros: Pros – Great benefits and ability to advance
review.cons: Cons – Volatile industry that continues to change
